name: The Stairway
summary:
You play as Stella, who has been invited to an event by her friend. 
However, after a while of being there, 
this friend is nowhere to be seen. 
Could she have possibly left without her? 
While wondering, Stella stumbles upon a strange stairway…
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Adventure probably
  • 游戏引擎: RPG Maker 2000
  • 售价: Free
  • 官方网站: https://illydna.itch.io/the-stairway
  • 官方网站: http://illydna.tumblr.com/stairway
